meanings.definition: The number that is equal to six times ten.
meanings.sent1: I counted up to sixty candies in the jar.
meanings.sent2: There are sixty minutes in an hour.
meanings.sent3: The teacher had sixty pencils on her desk, ready for the students.
meanings.sent4: The field was covered in sixty colorful balloons, creating a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The bakery displayed sixty delicious cupcakes in the window.

meanings.definition: A group or set of sixty individuals or things.
meanings.sent1: The choir consisted of sixty singers.
meanings.sent2: There were sixty chairs set up for the event.
meanings.sent3: The zoo welcomed a group of sixty penguins, waddling around happily.
meanings.sent4: The library received a donation of sixty new books, enriching its collection.
meanings.sent5: The team celebrated their win with sixty high-fives all around.
